text: The 2015 Formula Lites season was the inaugural season of the Formula Lites series, an open wheel motor racing championship powered by Honda and sanctioned by the Sports Car Club of America (SCCA). It began on 30 May at the Thompson Speedway in Thompson, Connecticut and ended on 20 September at the MSR Houston in Angleton, Texas, after six double-header rounds. ==Teams and competitors== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- !
